com.hlag.oversigt.core.eventsource

Annotation Type EventSource


  • @Target(value=TYPE)
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface EventSource
    Marks class as event source
    Author:
    Andrei Varabyeu, Olaf Neumann

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      String view
      Defines the name of the widget that will be used to render the data produced by this event source

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      DataItemDefault[] dataItemDefaults
      Provide default values for data items of widgets
      String[] dataItems
      Lists data items that users may change to configure the appearance of the rendered widget
      String description 
      String displayName
      Defines the display name of the event source.
      Class<? extends com.google.inject.Module> explicitConfiguration
      Provides custom Guice configuration for event source instances of the current event source
      String[] hiddenDataItems
      Widgets may bring a lot of data items.

    • Element Detail

      • view

        public abstract String view
        Defines the name of the widget that will be used to render the data produced by this event source
        Returns:
        the name of the widget to be used

      • displayName

        public abstract String displayName
        Defines the display name of the event source. If this field is left out the event source's class name will be used.
        Returns:
        the display name of the event source
        Default:
        ""

      • description

        public abstract String description
        Default:
        ""

      • dataItems

        public abstract String[] dataItems
        Lists data items that users may change to configure the appearance of the rendered widget
        Returns:
        a list of data item names
        Default:
        {}

      • hiddenDataItems

        public abstract String[] hiddenDataItems
        Widgets may bring a lot of data items. Sometimes it is not meaningful to show those data items to the user so with this attribute you have the possibility to hide these data items form the user.
        Returns:
        a list of data item names
        Default:
        {}

      • dataItemDefaults

        public abstract DataItemDefault[] dataItemDefaults
        Provide default values for data items of widgets
        Returns:
        a list of default values
        Default:
        {}

      • explicitConfiguration

        public abstract Class<? extends com.google.inject.Module> explicitConfiguration
        Provides custom Guice configuration for event source instances of the current event source
        Returns:
        a Module class object describing the module to use
        Default:
        com.hlag.oversigt.core.eventsource.EventSource.NOP.class
